我们到达了他的城堡.Translation: We have arrived at his castle.

门将会在15秒后开启.Translation: The door will open in 15 seconds.

门将会在30秒后开启.Translation: The door will open in 30 seconds.

一位玩家成为了勇者.Translation: A player has become the hero.

技能（front E）：向前发射刀光击退僵尸，cd5秒.Translation: Skill (front E): Shoot a blade forward to repel zombies, cooldown: 5 seconds.

技能（top E）：延迟3秒生成激光，击退僵尸5秒，仅一次【未解锁】.Translation: Skill (top E): Delay 3 seconds to generate a laser, repel zombies for 5 seconds, one-time use [Unlocked].

低门将会在30秒后开启.Translation: The lower door will open in 30 seconds.

中门将会在30秒后开启.Translation: The middle door will open in 30 seconds.

你们想要击败我，是吗.Translation: You want to defeat me, don't you

我会在塔的顶端等你.Translation: I will wait for you at the top of the tower

电梯将于20秒后启动.Translation: The elevator will start in 20 seconds.

这是一间只有轮回之人才能进入的房间.Translation: This is a room only accessible to those who have reincarnated.

一位玩家拾取了异能宝珠.Translation: A player has picked up a psychic orb.

方块察觉到了异常，变得更加强大.Translation: The cube sensed an anomaly and became stronger.

门将于30秒后开启.Translation: The door will open in 30 seconds.

电梯将于10秒后离开.Translation: The elevator will leave in 10 seconds.

电梯将于15秒后启动.Translation: The elevator will start in 15 seconds.

现在 该去面对他了.Translation: Now it’s time to face him.

没想到你会到达这里.Translation: I didn't expect you to make it here

但是，到此为止了.Translation: But this is where it ends

既然这样 那你也别想活着.Translation: In that case, you won't live either

跟着这个世界一起毁灭吧.Translation: Let yourself be destroyed along with this world

回到过去阻止他.Translation: Go back in time to stop him

坚持住 我们马上就成功了.Translation: Hold on, we are almost there

所以，你们到了这里.Translation: So, you have made it here

你怎么会有这个东西.Translation: How do you have this thing

那你就和我一起埋葬在这座城堡里吧！.Translation: Then you'll be buried with me in this castle!

他打算摧毁这座塔.Translation: He plans to destroy this tower

在塔被摧毁前离开这里.Translation: Leave here before the tower is destroyed

挂机僵尸将于10秒后传送.Translation: Hanging zombies will teleport in 10 seconds.

门将会在35秒后开启.Translation: The door will open in 35 seconds.

怎么可能让你逃出去.Translation: How can I let you escape

燃尽我最后的力量.Translation: I will burn my last strength

最终的门将会在15秒后关闭.Translation: The final door will close in 15 seconds.

感谢你的游玩.Translation: Thank you for playing. EN Translation: Allenw @ Ozlin Server
